description: Plug into the cigarette lighter or accessory socket in your car's dashboard or console and charge your iPod or iPhone while you travel. An LED ring lights up to show that PowerJolt is receiving power and is ready to charge. 2-amp output level means fastest possible charging for your iPad, iPhone or iPod. Built-in circuit protection keeps power at safe levels.
title: Griffin Technology PowerJolt SE 2 amp Power Charger for iPad, iPhone and iPod (Black)
